descriptor.name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (Shishu) Loan Guide
descriptor.short_desc: A course on securing a collateral-free business loan of up to ₹50,000 under the PMMY Shishu category for starting a micro-enterprise.
descriptor.long_desc:
Course Overview:
This module focuses on the 'Shishu' category of the Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY), the entry-level loan for aspiring entrepreneurs. Agents will learn how to guide individuals in securing their first business loan of up to ₹50,000 to start a new micro-enterprise.

  1. Loan Details:
    Understand the specifics of the Shishu loan, which covers amounts up to ₹50,000. It is ideal for very small businesses, street vendors, artisans, or individuals starting a new venture with minimal capital requirements.
  2. Eligibility and Documentation:
    Master the simple eligibility criteria for new entrepreneurs. Learn the basic documentation required, such as KYC documents and a simple business idea, making it accessible for those at the grassroots level.
  3. Application Process:
    Learn the process of applying for a Shishu loan through various lending institutions, including banks, NBFCs, and Micro-Finance Institutions (MFIs). The course emphasizes the collateral-free nature of the loan.

Why Take This Course:

  • Empower aspiring entrepreneurs to take their first step into the business world.
  • Specialize in the most accessible category of a major government scheme for micro-enterprise financing.
  • Become a key facilitator in fostering self-employment and grassroots economic activity.

descriptor.name: Haqdarshak
descriptor.short_desc: A social enterprise connecting citizens with their eligible government welfare schemes.
descriptor.long_desc: Haqdarshak is a tech platform that bridges the information and access gap between citizens and social protection services. We use an assisted-tech model with trained agents to provide last-mile support for discovering and applying for government and private welfare schemes.
